Data Fields

UINTN Resolution
EFI_PEI_STALL Stall

Detailed Description

This service provides a simple, blocking stall with platform-specific resolution.

Field Documentation

UINTN _EFI_PEI_STALL_PPI::Resolution

The resolution in microseconds of the stall services.
